WizardTD

类 App

  • java.lang.Object
    • processing.core.PApplet
      • WizardTD.App
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    processing.core.PConstants

    public class App
extends processing.core.PApplet
    App class is the main class that contains all critical methods to build the game. Methods in this class setup game, draw gameboard and detect user i/o from mouse and keyboard.
